name: Aquapac Small Electronics Case 348
description: Take a GPS or phone with you while kayaking, sailing, or kite boarding. This case protects your gadget from wetness, and the flexible material lets you operate a touchscreen, buttons, or switches.Made of UV-stabilized polymers that don't break down or discolour in sunlight.In direct sunlight, the air inside a transparent case heats up and causes condensation, to reduce this use desiccant packs.High-frequency welded seams are as strong as the surrounding material.Case dimensions are 11.5 x 19.5cm. Fits devices with circumference of 20cm, height of 15cm including the iPhone 6, 7 and 8.Includes an adjustable lanyard.Rated to IPX8 standard, submersible to 10m.Both the Aquapac® warranty and MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee cover this case itself. Neither guarantee covers the contents you put inside the case.
